page.title: 09HOUSING IN CASTLE VALE
page.content: CASTLE VALE HOUSING COVERS 1.5 SQUARE MILES.IT IS A RESIDENTIAL AREA OF 4 AND 3 BEDROOMED HOUSES,MAISONETTES AND HIGH-RISE FLATS.THERE ARE 5000 DWELLINGS AND 34 TOWER BLOCKS.THE TOWER BLOCKS ARE BUILT IN 2 SPINES ALONG THE ESTATE.THE HOUSES WERE ALL BUILT AT THE SAME TIME AND BY THE SAME BUILDERS- BRYANTS LTD. THE FIRST RESIDENTS MOVED IN IN 1963. MANY OF THE STREET NAMES,SCHOOLS,ETC., ARE BASED ON R.A.F. BASE NAMES AROUND THE COUNTRY E.G.CHIVENOR,FARNBOROUGH. THE FLATS WHICH ARE 14-17 STOREYS ARE NAMED AFTER AEROPLANES SUCH AS VULCAN HOUSE,TRIDENT HOUSE. THERE HAS BEEN A LOT OF NEW HOUSING BUILT AROUND THE OUTSKIRTS OF THE ESTATE WITHIN THE LAST FIVE YEARS.
